id: If You Remember Stan Lee For Anything, Let It Be This Quote
paragraph:
Stan Lee's rant about racism from 1968 is as relevant today as it was then.
        Lee created countless Marvel superheroes, including greats like Spider-Man and the X-Men. He has also endeared himself to movie audiences by making cameo appearances in every Marvel Studios movie to date.Charlottesville is in Virginia.
